description: There is an app called "Koubei", a service where you can see reviews.

examples.chinese: 想问问集美们这个女生口碑怎么样啊
examples.translation: Sisters, I want to ask, how is this girl's reputation?

examples.chinese: 这部电影口碑不错,我想去影院看看
examples.translation: This movie has a good reputation, I want to go to the cinema to see it

examples.chinese: 访日游客实施了分析谷歌地图上的评分和口碑
examples.translation: Visitors to Japan analyzed ratings and reviews on Google Maps
